mapper.sql: RESOURCES_ID, RESOURCES_NAME, RESOURCES_TYPE, PRIORITY, PARENT_ID, STATUS, DESCRIPTION, CREATED_TIME
mapper.select: select res.* from T_M_RESOURCES res,T_M_ROLE_RESOURCES rr where rr.RESOURCES_ID=res.RESOURCES_ID and rr.ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select RESOURCES_ID from T_M_RESOURCES where RESOURCES_TYPE = #{resourcesType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into T_M_RESOURCES (RESOURCES_ID, RESOURCES_NAME, RESOURCES_TYPE, PRIORITY, PARENT_ID, STATUS, DESCRIPTION, CREATED_TIME) values (#{resourcesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourcesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourcesType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into T_M_RESOURCES
RESOURCES_ID,
RESOURCES_NAME,
RESOURCES_TYPE,
PRIORITY,
PARENT_ID,
STATUS,
DESCRIPTION,
CREATED_TIME,

mapper.update:
update T_M_RESOURCES
RESOURCES_NAME = #{resourcesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESOURCES_TYPE = #{resourcesType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where RESOURCES_ID = #{resourcesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_M_RESOURCES set RESOURCES_NAME = #{resourcesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESOURCES_TYPE = #{resourcesType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where RESOURCES_ID = #{resourcesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
